author: cnbc.com
title: WOW! Internet, Cable & Phone Announces Delay in Earnings Release and Conference Call for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017
text:
ENGLEWOOD, Colo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- WideOpenWest, Inc. (“WOW!” or the “Company”) (NYSE: WOW), a leading, fully integrated provider of residential and commercial high-speed data, video and telephony services to customers in the United States, announced a delay in its fourth quarter and full year 2017 earnings release and conference call, previously scheduled for March 8, 2018, to allow additional time for our independent auditors to complete their review of the valuation analysis of indefinite lived intangible assets.
WOW! will announce the timing for the release of its 2017 financial results and related conference call details shortly.
About WOW!
WOW! is one of the nation's leading providers of high-speed Internet, cable TV and phone serving communities in the U.S. Our operating philosophy is to deliver an employee and customer experience that lives up to its name. For more information, please visit www.wowway.com .
 //www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180307005627/en/
